attributes.action: reverse the decision made by the Asylum and Immigration Tribunal to allow Learco Chindamo to remain in the UK because it would “breach his human rights”. Upon his release from prison, he should be deported to Italy. He was found guilty of killing Philip Lawrence and his human rights should not come before the rights of Frances Lawrence and her remaining family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
